data.actual_result: and it will have the day before selected and the current day bolded Client Settings: Latest Canary Release
data.expected_result: Calendar bolds the current day and selects it
data.short_description: Calendar not registering properly if you haven't restarted discord in 24hrs
data.steps_to_repro: - Open discord - Check the before/after in search calendar - Stay up past midnight without restarting discord - Check the before /after in search Calendar again
